articles.author: Natalie Allison
articles.title: Trump praises English-speaking Liberian president’s English - The Washington Post
articles.description: At a lunch with African leaders, President Trump complimented the president of Liberia on his English, apparently unaware that it’s the country’s official language.
articles.content: During his lunch with African leaders at the White House on Wednesday, President Donald Trump complimented the president of Liberia on his English-speaking skills, asking him where he learned to spea… [+2676 chars]
